text: 2 : 16pm : Take it with a grain of salt, but we have a report of a report that the Red Sox offered Mark Teixeira an eight - year, $200MM deal. Earl Bloom of the Orange County Register heard Dan Patrick say it on his radio show. It'd be best to treat the report with skepticism until it's confirmed by another source.
title: Red Sox - Teixeira Rumor.
